Data Sources
============

* `Open Street Map <https://www.openstreetmap.org>`_: Database where lines, terminals and power plants data is queried from
* `Open Street Browser <https://www.openstreetbrowser.org/>`_: Browser to easily analyse Open Street Map data
* `Energiemosaik Austria <https://www.energiemosaik.at/daten>`_: Model to estimate energy consumption per year in each municipality of Austria
* `STATatlas <https://www.statistik.at/atlas/>`_: Solar power estimation
* `STATISTIK AUSTRIA <https://data.statistik.gv.at/web/meta.jsp?dataset=OGDEXT_GEM_1>`_: Map data of municipalities of Austria (.shp file)
* `Open Data Austria <https://www.data.gv.at/katalog/dataset/stat_gliederung-osterreichs-in-nuts-einheiten51e57>`_: Breakdown of Austria into NUTS units (.shp files)
* `APG - Market Transparency - Load <https://markttransparenz.apg.at/en/markt/Markttransparenz/load/Ist-Last>`_: Load data for the APG control area
* `APG - Market Transparency - Generation <https://markttransparenz.apg.at/en/markt/Markttransparenz/generation/installed-capacity>`_: Installed power plant capacity in the APG control area
